hambanthota nagara sabha pitiye pawathi ambalangoda therapuththa jathika pasala saha balangoda aananda maithri madhya maha widuhala athara pawathi awurudu 19n pahala krikat tharagaye palamu inime jayak wartha kirimata therapuththa widuhala samathwiya.therapuththa palamu inime di isuru madhushan hathare pahara 8k ha haye pahara 2k samagin pandu 161kadi nodawi lakunu 100k raskaleya.aananda maithri palamu inima-163 (oowara 72) es.gamage 54 (suresh kodithuwakku 49/5, udayan hansana 12/4) saha dewana inima-170/6 (oowara 49) di.em.pi.gunasekara 103 (sithara dilanka 44/3) therapuththa 298/8 (oowara 56) ech.yu.isuru madhushan nodawi 100, dasun kaldera 55 (es.gamage 67/4).
